name: Foster
headline: A better way to write.
description: Community-powered writing workflow driven by some of the internet's best writers, editors, and experts.

founders.name: Dan Hunt, Founder
founders.description:
Entrepreneur focused on community-powered products.

Believe in a future built by tightly aligned, tech-enabled tribes.

Founded the world's largest cannabis community, MassRoots, and helped change marijuana policies in multiple states and Fortune 500s like Apple. Curated a community of NYC fitness enthusiasts for RCVR, a DTC brand in the athletic recovery space. Now building Compound Writing, a community-powered writing workflow.

raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/65fa5c9eb3cc0c029164d3ce_foster-logo-lockup.svg)](https://foster.co/</>)
[Membership](https://foster.co/</membership>)
![Substack logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/663fb3e1d43ef396ffb6daf0_substack-logo.png)
# Find your writing tribe
Hi, we‚Äôre Foster. We‚Äôve cultivated a way of writing together that leads to truer expressions of creativity and self. It‚Äôs fun, it‚Äôs interesting, and it makes writing easier, less lonely, and more fulfilling. Curious? Come try our signature Writing Circle and see what we‚Äôre all about.
[Join a Free Writing Circle](https://foster.co/<https:/tally.so/r/w714J2>)
## Foster in the Words of the Collective
‚ÄúThis writing circle has changed my life. Thank you for sharing this special gift with the world.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/662123264c467cc6c2c331e0_maja-t.png)
Maja T.
‚ÄúThanks to Foster, I have reached an unimaginable level of acceptance and understanding of who I am. The community was critical in processing the loss of my mom, clarifying my vocation, and meeting people I love more than family.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600979b9e4cbfc618705fb0_image-sp-nicolas.jpg)
Nicolas F.
‚ÄúFoster has helped me unlock myself in ways I didn‚Äôt know were possible.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/660096b3978d59646abb372b_image-sp-leo.jpeg)
Leo G.
"I can map the success in my writing career in lock step with joining Foster. It's not a coincidence."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/660096b38ca92e548d4d82bf_image-sp-sarah.jpeg)
Sarah W.
‚ÄúFoster has been the best thing that‚Äôs happened for my writing and for my creativity.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/660096b4d493d5a53c315e6f_image-sp-yashmi.png)
Yashmi A.
‚ÄúFoster is so supportive and gives me space to take care of myself. It‚Äôs not just a writing program.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/660096b4143b5f99dece5420_image-sp-daniela.jpeg)
Daniela U.
‚ÄúWhat have you done to me? Writing used to be a side thang. All I do is write now ü§™‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600979b5606666d3068d433_image-sp-azalea.jpg)
Azalea M.
## The Foster Way
Foster combines community, consistency, and self-inquiry to help writers get into flow and unlock our truest, most authentic expression. Here‚Äôs how we do it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/66008d078ca92e548d443634_image-winter-retreat.jpg)
  1. Be present with the questions, complexities, and muses we‚Äôre currently experiencing.
  2. Sense into our emotions and intuitions and write from a fully felt and embodied state.
  3. With the help of our peers, reflect on what we‚Äôve written and make changes as necessary.
  4. Express ourselves, speaking creative new possibilities into existence, and attracting aligned others into our orbit.


## How We Practice Together
### Weekly Writing Circles
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6642a1d252d375ddd03c1bbb_writing.png)
Coming together on Zoom to write each week is our foundational practice. Writing Circles are artfully-crafted, 90-minute containers for writers to drop into what feels most alive and write from that place. 
Our facilitators play with meditation, somatic experiencing, breathwork, and other modalities to help writers drop into embodied states of flow and unfettered expression. 
After a dedicated period of focused writing, we circle back and share our experience, perhaps even reading something we‚Äôve written. 
[Join a Free Writing Circle](https://foster.co/<https:/tally.so/r/w714J2>)
### Bi-annual Retreats
Twice a year we get together in person for a few days to go deeper into our writing practice, our relationship with ourselves, and our relationships with each other. In the summer we convene in upstate New York, but in the winter we like to visit warmer locales (Mexico and Costa Rica, so far).
We also make sure to have a little fun, going on excursions specific to the area we‚Äôre visiting. We mix it up with a little bit of practice and a little bit of adventure ‚Äì some of our favorite activities have included yoga, cacao ceremonies, sound healing, aquahara, hiking to waterfalls, surfing, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/66008d075ca456b046fbfd69_image-mandala.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/66008d07179511a669f8c4b7_image-sunset.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/66008d07143b5f99dec6306d_image-shala-circle.jpg)
### Community Support
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/65fb87330e81ded4aa88e5fb_icon-whatsapp.png)
#### WhatsApp
We love to trade links and discuss all the things worth discussing, and we do that in dedicated WhatsApp channels.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/65fb8733fd3ca0bccfb03894_icon-professional-editing.png)Professional EditingLeverage the professional and editors in the Foster collective for thoughtful feedback and edits.](https://foster.co/<https:/app.foster.co>)
## Reasons You Might Want to Join Foster
  * Start a writing practice or breathe new life into your existing practice. 
  * Beat back your inner critic and access deeper, more authentic ideas and emotions in your work. 
  * Explore sensitive and challenging topics in a supportive community. 
  * Make progress on an idea and/or sustain momentum with your writing projects. 
  * Stop writing to please others and start writing as a means of expressing yourself and inhabiting new possibilities in your work and life.
  * Meet other creative, curious humans in a genuine, earnest, welcoming environment where you feel seen and witnessed in this often lonely pursuit.


[Join a Free Writing Circle](https://foster.co/<https:/tally.so/r/w714J2>)
## A Co-Operated Collective
We are a collective of writers, editors, coaches, technologists, metamodern magicians and more who are united by our belief in the transformative, life-affirming power of the written word. You‚Äôll find writers of all skill levels in Foster. From published authors to newsletter writers to people who just started writing, our collective contains multitudes. The core team here currently consists of five Stewards, with the support of sixteen Contributors.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600a9f9d563105ac643e6af_image-steward-dan.jpg)Dan HuntStewardDan Hunt, Foster's founder and former head editor of an activist publication with 700K readers, writes Storyless and advises top startups on narrative design and development](https://foster.co/<http:/danhunt.substack.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/663fbb8ea6fe9a26f97d4e64_sara-campbell.png)Sara CampbellStewardSara Campbell is the mind behind Tiny Revolutions, a newsletter about becoming who you are, and The Fire Inside, a group coaching program for women who want to become the fiercest, truest versions of themselves.](https://foster.co/<http:/www.saracampbell.co>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600a9f93ccf390baa799bd1_image-steward-minnow.jpg)Minnow ParkStewardMinnow Park writes Like the Fish, a photoblog that journals lessons he‚Äôs learning as a coach and photographer.](https://foster.co/<https:/www.minnowpark.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600a9f9e9c8c82134cc9b2c_image-steward-steph.jpg)Steph SoussloffStewardSteph Soussloff is an org designer, facilitator, and somatic coach with a track record in cultivating wise & enlivening ecosystems that expand what‚Äôs possible in the ways we organize, relate, create, lead, & live.](https://foster.co/<https:/bio.site/stephsoussloff>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600a9f9685e4750b36d9eba_image-steward-lyle.jpg)Lyle McKeanyStewardLyle McKeany is a writer and creative coach who writes Just Enough to Get Me in Trouble, a newsletter about the pains and joys of fatherhood and life.](https://foster.co/<http:/lyle.blog>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5f5562151b3f8cad3_alicia-bonner.jpg)Alicia BonnerContributorWriter, community enthusiast at Fetch Me Home, sharing life and connection stories.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade59f8fb2df9fd6243c_amanda-azadian.jpg)Amanda AzadianContributorWriter, health-tech PM, TCM student, yoga teacher exploring ancient-modern health at Mod-a-tional.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5f6779437260f20b5_anthony-pica.jpg)Anthony PicaContributorMarketing exec, truth-seeker, ping pong enthusiast; writes From Within & Work Smart Lead Better.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5bf0df3a983a45faa_april-resnick.jpg)April ResnickContributorPlanner, quilter, writer at What It Is, navigating life's challenges with strategic prose.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5a048a66f817428df_cassandra-ellis.jpg)Cassandra EllisContributorQuestioner, dancer, dog listener at Be With Cassandra, inviting surprising insights.](https://foster.co/<http:/www.bewithcassandra.com>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade535c2525cc55f5db3_danver-chandler.jpg)Danver ChandlerContributorAdventurous writer exploring psycho-spirituality on Icing On The Cake.](https://foster.co/<https:/www.danverchandler.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade59793199d21981d28_dylan-tweney.jpg)Dylan TweneyContributorCraft-focused storyteller aiding entrepreneurs at dylan.tweney.com.](https://foster.co/<https:/dylan.tweney.com>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5541a6b44fb621fda_indigo-habel.jpg)Indigo HabelContributorUX content designer helping share meaningful stories online.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade53b066142184f5388_jasmine-pierik.jpg)Jasmine PierikContributorConnector, facilitator, pop-up curator orbiting play, learning, and craft.](https://foster.co/<https:/jasminepierik.com>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade5873014ede3952f73_jesse-evers.jpg)Jesse EversContributorCommunity organizer, life's small moments documentor at Highside Workshop.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade57c162ee164fecd14_jg.jpg)JGContributorFoster editor, writer exploring spiritual spacetime and culture.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade6f3b66246b64fc237_jude-klinger.jpg)Judith KlingerContributorNovelist, editor, lover of well-told stories, hedonism, and epicurean delights.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade60489d0185de5d720_joel-christiansen.jpg)Joel ChristiansenContributorSoftware developer aiding writers' creativity rituals, pondering climate futurism.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade6f3b66246b64fc22d_melody-song.jpg)Melody SongContributorWriter on self-discovery, creativity, and psychology at With Love, Mel.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade6e89af2b4fc073de3_nicholas-goodey.jpg)Nicholas GoodeyContributorMind behind Nick Lets Rip, supporting others' lives through shared experiences.](https://foster.co/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/664fade61c8257e0967f8aa1_nicholas-forero.jpg)Nicolas ForeroContributorColombian writer, nerd, marketer, dancer sharing insights and generating success.](https://foster.co/<#>)
### Check out [CoAuthored](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/>), Foster‚Äôs co-written Substack
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600bd4dcaf91db80a8851d3_image-article-discovering.webp)Discovering My Art Practice Through WritingHow being part of Foster helped me discover my callingCaryn Tan](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/discovering-my-art-practice-through>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600be31fe28188d943603e3_image-article-high.webp)High on StoriesReveling in the transformative power of writingSara Campbell](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/high-on-stories>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/6600be4e72c2673924933997_image-article-typist.webp)From Typist to WriterNotes on becoming a more honest, vulnerable, loving, creative, open, conscious, spiritual, and hip-moving individualNicolas Forero](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/from-typist-to-writer>)
#### Join our mailing list
Get the latest posts from CoAuthored and news from Foster
### FAQs
Why does the world need Foster?
Because for many of us, the joys and benefits of writing have been co-opted by the need for our work to be perfect, or to perform for us in some way. **Foster is the antidote.** Because the truth is you don‚Äôt have to identify as a ‚ÄúWriter‚Äù to benefit from writing ‚Äì this age-old practice remains one of the most reliable tools we have to root ourselves into more truthful, nourishing lives.
Do I have to be a ‚Äúwriter‚Äù to be in Foster?
No. This is for anyone who likes writing and would like to get to know themselves a little better. All you have to do is show up and write down stuff that‚Äôs on your mind. That said, we do have a good mix of hobbyists and professional writers in Foster ‚Äì and in fact, some of us have actually [become pros](https://foster.co/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2024/01/06/style/wedding-sheet-cakes-table-long.html>) since joining!
What does it mean to practice in community?
It means we write together, and we do it often. Right now our weekly Writing Circles primarily take place on Zoom, but we intend to offer in-person circles as our community expands. We also host monthly Cohorts, connect via WhatsApp asynchronously, and get together in person twice a year for retreats.
How do I join Foster?
First things first, [join one of our Writing Circles](https://foster.co/<https:/tally.so/r/w714J2>) to see if you like it. And then if you‚Äôre interested, you can [join a Cohort](https://foster.co/<https:/www.foster.co/cohorts>).
Will Foster help me become a better writer?
Getting better at writing is like getting better at anything ‚Äì you have to practice. So we keep our focus on showing up and doing just that. Not because it will do something for our career (though it might!), nor because it will help us gain a ton of followers (though it might do that, too!), but for the sheer joy of it. But yes, to answer your question, if you consistently show up to the practice, you will get better at writing.
Will I 10X my productivity as a writer if I join Foster?
That‚Äôs up to you and how often (and how earnestly) you sit down and just do it. That said, people who write with us reliably report breakthroughs in their work. They go deeper, push themselves to try new genres and forms, and publish more often as well.
Are you trying to tell me with a straight face that you can make writing easier and more fun?
Lol it‚Äôs crazy, right? But when you approach it like an experiment and explore what‚Äôs alive and true for you, writing has a way of becoming a lot more enjoyable. Plus, you get that wonderful feeling of clarity and accomplishment when you‚Äôre done writing. It‚Äôs addictive!
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/660091dc58f2d38047efac50_foster-logo-gray.png)](https://foster.co/</>)
[Cohorts](https://foster.co/</cohorts>)[Membership](https://foster.co/</membership>)[Log in](https://foster.co/<https:/app.foster.co/>)
[![Substack logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/663fb3e1d43ef396ffb6daf0_substack-logo.png)](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/>)[![X logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fa57196af60d82922043cc/663fb370b44dcaec02f94494_x-logo.png)](https://foster.co/<https:/twitter.com/0xFoster>)

![‚ü®28‚ü©Discovering My Art Practice Through WritingHow being part of Foster helped me discover my callingCaryn Tan](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/discovering-my-art-practice-through>)![‚ü®29‚ü©High on StoriesReveling in the transformative power of writingSara Campbell](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/high-on-stories>)![‚ü®30‚ü©From Typist to WriterNotes on becoming a more honest, vulnerable, loving, creative, open, conscious, spiritual, and hip-moving individualNicolas Forero](https://foster.co/<https:/coauthored.co/p/from-typist-to-writer>)
#### Join our mailing list
Get the latest posts from CoAuthored and news from Foster
### FAQs
Why does the world need Foster?
Because for many of us, the joys and benefits of writing have been co-opted by the need for our work to be perfect, or to perform for us in some way. **Foster is the antidote.** Because the truth is you don‚Äôt have to identify as a ‚ÄúWriter‚Äù to benefit from writing ‚Äì this age-old practice remains one of the most reliable tools we have to root ourselves into more truthful, nourishing lives.
Do I have to be a ‚Äúwriter‚Äù to be in Foster?
No. This is for anyone who likes writing and would like to get to know themselves a little better. All you have to do is show up and write down stuff that‚Äôs on your mind. That said, we do have a good mix of hobbyists and professional writers in Foster ‚Äì and in fact, some of us have actually become pros‚ü®31‚ü© since joining!
What does it mean to practice in community?
It means we write together, and we do it often. Right now our weekly Writing Circles primarily take place on Zoom, but we intend to offer in-person circles as our community expands. We also host monthly Cohorts, connect via WhatsApp asynchronously, and get together in person twice a year for retreats.
How do I join Foster?
First things first, join one of our Writing Circles‚ü®4‚ü© to see if you like it. And then if you‚Äôre interested, you can join a Cohort‚ü®32‚ü©.
Will Foster help me become a better writer?
Getting better at writing is like getting better at anything ‚Äì you have to practice. So we keep our focus on showing up and doing just that. Not because it will do something for our career (though it might!), nor because it will help us gain a ton of followers (though it might do that, too!), but for the sheer joy of it. But yes, to answer your question, if you consistently show up to the practice, you will get better at writing.
Will I 10X my productivity as a writer if I join Foster?
That‚Äôs up to you and how often (and how earnestly) you sit down and just do it. That said, people who write with us reliably report breakthroughs in their work. They go deeper, push themselves to try new genres and forms, and publish more often as well.
Are you trying to tell me with a straight face that you can make writing easier and more fun?
Lol it‚Äôs crazy, right? But when you approach it like an experiment and explore what‚Äôs alive and true for you, writing has a way of becoming a lot more enjoyable. Plus, you get that wonderful feeling of clarity and accomplishment when you‚Äôre done writing. It‚Äôs addictive!

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Foster**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from New York, Foster emerged out of the belief that writing can be a community-driven endeavor, where creativity flourishes in supportive environments. It‚Äôs a fresh approach to writing, catering to anyone from seasoned authors to those merely dipping their toes into the literary waters. Foster is part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, which offers a testament to its innovative potential and growth trajectory.

**Mission Statement**: A better way to write.

### What Does Foster Do?

Foster operates as a collective of writers, editors, and creative thinkers, providing various avenues for individuals to explore and enhance their writing. At the heart of Foster‚Äôs offering are their **Writing Circles**, where members engage in structured writing sessions, drawing on community support to cultivate their craft. These circles create a space to share experiences, provide feedback, and discover new ideas‚Äîall while grounding participants in a consistent writing practice.

**Key Activities**:
1. **Weekly Writing Circles**: These 90-minute sessions invite participants to write, meditate, and connect. The sessions are designed to help writers tap into a flow state, enabling genuine expression and exploration.
  
2. **Bi-annual Retreats**: Twice a year, Foster organizers bring members together in serene locations, merging structured writing practice with community bonding and fun activities, like yoga and excursions.

3. **Community Support**: Beyond the circles, Foster fosters interaction through WhatsApp channels, allowing members to share ideas, links, and support asynchronously.

### Why Join Foster?

Foster provides an antidote to the pressures often associated with writing‚Äîperfectionism and isolation. Here are compelling reasons to consider joining:
- **Revitalize Your Writing**: Whether you're starting anew or need a spark for ongoing projects, Foster helps breath fresh air into your writing practice.
- **Beat the Inner Critic**: In a nurturing space, you can confront and overcome barriers to genuine expression.
- **Supportive Environment**: Collaborate and connect with other curious and creative minds; experience the communal journey of writing where everyone sees and witnesses each other‚Äôs journeys.

### The Collective

The Foster community is made up of about 15 employees, alongside numerous contributors and stewards‚Äîfostering a diverse range of talents. Foundational team members include experienced writers and coaches who guide the collective, ensuring that all participants feel welcome and encouraged to express their unique voices.

### Strike a Chord

Members of the Foster community speak passionately about their experiences, declaring life changes catalyzed by the program. They highlight moments of clarity, creative breakthroughs, and meaningful connections formed through shared writing practices. Foster stands as a reminder that writing doesn‚Äôt have to be a solitary endeavor‚Äîit's a communal exploration that can serve as a lifeline to creativity and self-discovery.

**Interested?** Check out [Foster‚Äôs website](https://foster.co) to join a free writing circle and discover how this collective can transform your writing journey.
